tool.name: POST Document
tool.description: Posts an annotated document to the PubAnnotation server
tool.help:
Posts a single LIF document to the LappsTest project on PubAnnotation.org
Description -----------
**NOTE** This is a development version and the project, user email, and password are hardcoded into the input form.
This tool accepts a PubAnnotation JSON document and uploads (HTTP POST) it to the PubAnnotation server. A copy of the uploaded file (as returned by the Pubannotation server) is also written to disk for Galaxy to use.
Use the *Convert* tool to convert a LIF document to the PubAnnotation JSON format before uploading.
